meanings.sent1: The forest path grew snaggier as we ventured deeper into the woods.
meanings.sent2: The old sweater was getting snaggier with each wash.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the snaggier fishing line was like solving a tricky puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a snaggier maze, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The snaggier terrain made it challenging to navigate through the dense forest.

meanings.sent1: The fabric felt snaggier after being caught on a rough surface.
meanings.sent2: The rope became snaggier with each use, fraying at the edges.
meanings.sent3: The snaggier edges of the blanket made it look like a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: His voice sounded snaggier as he tried to speak through a sore throat.
meanings.sent5: The snaggier texture of the carpet added a rustic charm to the room.

meanings.sent1: The snaggier fabric easily caught on sharp corners.
meanings.sent2: The brush became snaggier as it tangled with branches along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The snaggier hair tie kept getting stuck in her hair.
meanings.sent4: His snaggier fishing hook often got caught on underwater debris.
meanings.sent5: The snaggier material of the gloves made it difficult to slide them on smoothly.
